refsynopsisdiv.title: Syntax
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: imout = imresize(imin, scale) imout = imresize(imin, scale, interp) imout = imresize(imin, [mrows ncols]) imout = imresize(imin, [mrows ncols], interp)

listitem.para: An image which will be resized.
The size of resized image is [width, height] x scale .
Interpolation method. The value of interp must be one of the follows:

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: imresize resize the input image. When scale parameter is specified, the width and height of the image is resized in the same scale. There are four interpolation method can be used: nearest-neigbor, bilinear, bicubic and area methods. The default method is nearest-neigbor method.
